p: Thiadiazole group-containing amides of dehydroabietic or acrylpimaric acids can be prepared from adequate rosin acid, thiosemicarbazide and an acyl chloride according to Scheme 40, and using such separation methods as filtration, vacuum drying, recrystallization and column chromatography [ 130]. They can be potentially applied as insecticides [ 130, 190].
